alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 09 at 3:18AM CST until March 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE NORTHWEST TEXAS PANHANDLE AND WESTERN HALF OF THE OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron and Texas. In Texas... Dallam...Sherman and Hartley. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 4. * Timing...Noon through 7 PM CST.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
